wikipedia_page.main: Nicholas Matthews Condy, or Nicholas Condy the Younger (1816 – 20 May 1851) was a British maritime painter.

response: *Nicholas Matthews Condy (1816-1851), British maritime painter, son of Nicholas Condy
He was married to Ann Trevanion Pyle (1792–1860), daughter of Captain Mark Oates of the Marines, and was the father of maritime painter Nicholas Matthews Condy, who is occasionally confused with him.

In 1871, he married Harriet Charlotte Florence Pigott née Condy (1846-1880), the daughter of the painter Nicholas Matthews Condy. After her death, he remarried the daughter of an officer stationed in the North-Western Provinces. This led to a two-year stay in India.
